channel.title: [508] Shops on Espeon [508]
channel.description:
I didn't have shopbuyconfig.java, so I made one. I pretty much ripped it out of my other source and left the information that was needed. So I went into NPCoption2, and pasted this:
[code] case 34: p.viewings = 1; p.shopid = 2; p.frames.showInterface(p, 278); p.frames.setItems(p, 278, 89, 94, p.shop2, p.shop2n); p.frames.setString(p, "Starter Shop", 278, 88); break; [/code]
Now, when I compile, I get this error:
[code] Compiling all files.... .
et\com\espeon
et\packethandler\NPCOption2.java:49: cannot find symbol symbol : variable frames location: class net.com.espeon.model.Player p.frames.showInterface(p, 278); ^ .
et\com\espeon
et\packethandler\NPCOption2.java:50: cannot find symbol symbol : variable frames location: class net.com.espeon.model.Player p.frames.setItems(p, 278, 89, 94, p.shop2, p.shop2n); ^ .
et\com\espeon
et\packethandler\NPCOption2.java:51: cannot find symbol symbol : variable frames location: class net.com.espeon.model.Player p.frames.setString(p, "Starter Shop", 278, 88); ^ Note: .
et\com\espeon
et\SocketListener.java uses unchecked or unsafe operatio ns. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:unchecked for details. 3 errors Press any key to continue . . . [/code]
Im gonna be playing around with this for a while, but if anyone knows how to fix this, please post!

item.title: [508] Shops on Espeon [508]
item.dc:creator: @pk3r_john pk3r john
item.description:
@pk3r_john wrote:

I didnâ€™t have shopbuyconfig.java, so I made one. I pretty much ripped it out of my other source and left the information that was needed.
So I went into NPCoption2, and pasted this:

case 34:
		p.viewings = 1;
		p.shopid = 2;
		p.frames.showInterface(p, 278);
		p.frames.setItems(p, 278, 89, 94, p.shop2, p.shop2n);
		p.frames.setString(p, "Starter Shop", 278, 88);
			break;

Now, when I compile, I get this error:

Compiling all files....
.\net\com\espeon\net\packethandler\NPCOption2.java:49: cannot find symbol
symbol  : variable frames
location: class net.com.espeon.model.Player
                p.frames.showInterface(p, 278);
                 ^
.\net\com\espeon\net\packethandler\NPCOption2.java:50: cannot find symbol
symbol  : variable frames
location: class net.com.espeon.model.Player
                p.frames.setItems(p, 278, 89, 94, p.shop2, p.shop2n);
                 ^
.\net\com\espeon\net\packethandler\NPCOption2.java:51: cannot find symbol
symbol  : variable frames
location: class net.com.espeon.model.Player
                p.frames.setString(p, "Starter Shop", 278, 88);
                 ^
Note: .\net\com\espeon\net\SocketListener.java uses unchecked or unsafe operatio
ns.
Note: Recompile with -Xlint:unchecked for details.
3 errors
Press any key to continue . . .

Im gonna be playing around with this for a while, but if anyone knows how to fix this, please post!
